remarks.para: May be inoperative provided it is not required by 14 CFR.

note.para: If ADS-B is installed in lieu of or as a replacement for 14 CFR required equipment, repair category in operator's MEL will be the same as that of 14 CFR required equipment.

placard.para: Placard ADS-B "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
